name: 專業藝術英語（一）
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)修習 ◎課程不開放上修
syllabus:
This course will cover a selection of artist works or short articles  that those studying the arts should know. This list includes painters, sculptors, photographers, etc.  Read, understand, translation...learning and practcing to express one's own art works.These works and articles will be used as prompts to engage thinking and as a source of inspiration.

本課程挑選學習藝術應該知道的藝術家作品或是短論，包括畫家、雕塑家、攝影師….。透過閱讀、摘要、翻譯...學習並練習如何詮釋一件作品，並使之成為思考的良好契機、以及作為啟發創作靈感的元素。(可用各類字典及翻譯工具)

1\. Course Introduction  
2\. Brief self-introducion in English、 短句英翻中 (可用各類字典及翻譯工具)  
3\. Van Gogh-The Starry Night  
4\. Hopper- Nighthawks  
5\. Monet- Water Lilies  
6\. Michelangelo-David  
7\. Klimt- The Kiss  
8\. Munch-The Scream  
9\. De Vinci-Mona Lisa  
10\. Rodin- The Thinker  
11\. Gericault- The Raft of  the Medusa  
12\. Vermeer- The Milkmaid  
13\. Wahrol- Marilyn Diptych  
14\. Rothko - Seagram Murals  
15\. Kusama  
16. Comprehensive discussion

methodologies.note: Notes and a brief conclusion will be provided
Students will take notes for discussion.
